text: "When Love Comes to Town" is a 1989 song by B.B. King and U2. It is the 12th track from their 1988 album Rattle and Hum. It went to number 1 in Ireland, number 4 in New Zealand, number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in the Netherlands, number 13 in Italy, number 16 in Belgium, number 20 in Sweden, number 23 in Australia, number 41 in Canada and number 68 in the United States. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1989 songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:U2 songs Category:B.B. King songs Category:Joss Stone songs
title: When Love Comes to Town
